channel.title: Server auto closes as soon as i click run
channel.description:
when i click run server it opens and closes in seconds and when i compile it cant find java or somethin bunk like that. i have ran it on this computer before but it was rebooted. am i missing a step i think i did my java right if not please help is there a certain version of java i need ?
i got the newest one
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 07, 2009, 07:06:17 pm[/size][hr]please help : ]

item.title: Server auto closes as soon as i click run
item.dc:creator: @gnarlwode gnarlwode
item.description:
@gnarlwode wrote:

I should add, while Firefox gives no error or warning, and closes all tabs, IE does give an error: “A problem with this webpage caused Internet Explorer to close and reopen the tab.”

Read full topic
